title: Gensol Engineering bags 16 MW rooftop project in Madhya Pradesh
description: Gensol Engineering received a 16 megawatt rooftop solar project from a textile company in Madhya Pradesh, a repeat order under its commercial and industrial segment. The project, to be executed on an EPC basis, will be completed in six months and will feature high-efficiency bi-facial solar modules.
